trends: There have been no other sightings in Chia
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog, I saw a rare very bright "star" it was huge compared to the stars around. The walk took about 5 min, and the "start" did not change at all, not in size, light nor position. I went inside my house to take my Ipad to look at it with a constellation app, when I went back to look at it, I was surprised it wasn't there anymore.
Summary: Very bright, huge compared with a start besides it.
